summary: The Contoso Wireless TV product offers a wide range of features, including access to over 500 channels, HD and 4K programming, and on-demand movies and shows. The cost of upgrading your services depends on the package you choose and includes professional installation of all necessary equipment. Compatible devices such as smart TVs or streaming devices may be needed to access all features, as well as an internet connection with at least 10 Mbps download speed. More information about the packages and features is available on their website, and customer support is available 24/7 if you have any questions.
